text:
Hello everyone! :wave:

Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! :christmas_tree:

I’m excited to announce that we’ve just relaunched our new Saigon Digital agency website. :rocket:

We’re always on the look out for new partners, teams and people to work with! If you are another agency doing great things with HubSpot CMS or Jamstack based web dev projects, reach out to me for a chat to see if can potentially collaborate.

:link: Website:  <http://saigon.digital>

Enjoy the festivities all and thanks for the great community :christmas_tree: :gift:
